config.tdsound.title: TDsound
config.tdsound.victory_volume.tooltip: Volume for victory music after winning battles (0.0 - 1.0)
Volume for congratulations music after evolution completes (0.0 - 1.0)
config.tdsound.catch_congrat_volume.tool: Volume for congratulations music when catching Pokemon (0.0 - 1.0)
config.tdsound.flee_volume.tooltip: Volume for flee music when player flees from battle (0.0 - 1.0)
config.tdsound.enable_victory_music.tool: Enable victory music after winning battles
config.tdsound.enable_evolution_music.to: Enable congratulations music after Pokemon evolution
config.tdsound.enable_catch_music.toolti: Enable congratulations music when catching Pokemon
config.tdsound.enable_flee_music.tooltip: Enable flee music when player flees from battle
config.tdsound.victory_music_duration.to: How long victory music plays in milliseconds (default: 15000 = 15 seconds)
config.tdsound.debug_logging.tooltip: Enable debug logging for troubleshooting (check console logs)
